backend/main.mo: Motoko actor managing chat sessions, user profiles, and permissions while generating Puro roleplay responses and parsing action messages ending with *.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata listing implemented features, associated files, components, and test identifiers for the project.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend source file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining color tokens and theming for light and dark modes in the chat UI.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file loading the React app entrypoint and setting the page title.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React component handling authentication, profile gating, and rendering either login, profile setup, or the chat page.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading states and cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatCompose: Message input component supporting Enter-to-send, Shift+Enter for newlines, and action detection when messages end with *.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatTranscr: Scrollable transcript displaying message history or an empty-state prompt when no messages exist.
frontend/src/components/chat/MessageBubb: Renders individual chat messages with styling for sender type and action vs dialogue formatting.
Avatar component showing Puro’s image in various sizes.
frontend/src/components/layout/ChatLayou: Layout wrapper providing header, footer, and consistent visual structure for the chat interface.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Modal that collects and saves the user's display name using a profile mutation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context using Dfinity Internet Identity with stateful login, logout, and identity restoration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profiles and chat operations using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS base with theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/ChatPage.tsx: Chat UI page that loads history, sends messages, handles errors, and manages scrolling.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session storage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and container settings, and loading typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: JSON describing the project’s current state, features, pending requests, and metadata for an AI chat app centered on roleplaying as Puro.
